about_the_game:
There are various cultivation gameplay options in the game, including tank upgrade, accessory upgrade, tank research, renovation, advancement, fleet collection and cultivation. Featuring various PVE gameplay options such as battle levels and endless challenges. Strong PVP gameplay such as Qualifying Arena, Cross server Arena, Peak Arena, Multi formation Arena, Hundred server Battle, Zone Tournament, Peak Tournament, etc.

Gorgeous and realistic battle scenes

Realistic tanks, magnificent buildings, and magnificent and realistic combat effects make it feel like you are walking into a vast battlefield where fire and blood blend together!

Strong Iron Curtain Era Background

The tripartite forces stand together, bringing you back to the Iron Curtain era! The distinct background of the times will make you feel like you are in person, and unconsciously it will ignite your passion for battle!

A variety of tank types

Five different types of tanks bring completely different driving experiences, and the mutually restrained models do not have absolute advantages on the battlefield. Only perfect cooperation can win the war.

Multi directional and multi-level technological development

Technology is power! Research institutes can enhance the various refined attributes of your tanks and turrets. Whether you want to attack or armor, enhance them according to your preferences! Of course, comprehensive development is the king's way!
detailed_description:
There are various cultivation gameplay options in the game, including tank upgrade, accessory upgrade, tank research, renovation, advancement, fleet collection and cultivation. Featuring various PVE gameplay options such as battle levels and endless challenges. Strong PVP gameplay such as Qualifying Arena, Cross server Arena, Peak Arena, Multi formation Arena, Hundred server Battle, Zone Tournament, Peak Tournament, etc.

name: 坦克队长-高清畅玩版

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: Core I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: Core I5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Tank Captain "is a strategic warfare game where players will play the role of commander and engage in different tank combinations to enhance the refined attributes of tanks and artillery. They can enhance their attack or armor abilities according to their preferences and win the war.
